name: Dance Of The Deadly Doubles
description:
A game about a haunted victorian ball room / art gallery where sophisticated people come to dance and also stab each other.

Local multiplayer co-op.

Each player controls 2 characters with xbox controller analog sticks. One of them is a ghost mirror-image.

If the ghost gets stabbed, the stabber gets stunned. Only the real person can stab. Use trigger to stab, and twirl around each other to hide who's what.
